name: Jhonka's Riches
dscr: Find a treasure hut.

name: Aztec Gold
dscr: Find the treasure huts on every level layout.

name: The Cheat
dscr: Discover the 30 lives cheat.

name: Beat That Score!
dscr: A score Strong Sad couldn't beat even if he wanted to play this game.

name: Warren Robinett Jr.
dscr: Discover the coolest secret thing you've ever found in a video game, man.

name: Smell The Daisies
dscr: Spend more than 10 minutes on a single level.

name: Twees It Out
dscr: Watch the Dancin' Time cutscene.

name: No Loafing
dscr: Complete a level without stopping.

name: Denial
dscr: As the S is for Sucks Dragon, die while attempting to stomp.

name: Self-Indulgence
dscr: Discover an even cooler, secreter thing than some dude's name.

name: Congraturation
dscr: Beat the game.

name: Nice Try Dodongo!
dscr: Attempt the S is for Sucks secret from version 2.0.

name: Peasant Intern
dscr: Burninate a cottage via a peasant.

name: A Real Close Shave
dscr: Finish a level where the Troghammer arrived without dying.

name: Crapdangle!
dscr: Kick the machine after dying.

name: And The Trogdor Comes In The...
dscr: Beat a nighttime level.

name: Meatball Sub
dscr: As Wormdingler, eat a peasant with your extendo-tongue.

name: Hardybardy
dscr: Beat all 100 levels as Trogdor with the same settings as the original Flash game.

name: Disk of Healing
dscr: Gain an extra life from earning points.

name: Super Trinket
dscr: As the S Is For Sucks Dragon, knock an arrow out of the sky with your stomp.

name: Arch Deluxe
dscr: Game Over to the archer.

name: Stonklar
dscr: (idk but maybe this should unlock wraparound movement in the settings)
